source_setting.source: select assignee_id,first_seen_date, last_seen_date,lastknown_city,lastknown_country,lastknown_latitude,lastknown_longitude,lastknown_state, name_first,name_last,num_inventors,num_patents, organization,type,years_active  from PatentsView_20210930.assignee order by assignee_id LIMIT {limit} offset {offset};

assignee_years.source: select d.assignee_id,d.patent_year, d.num_patents from PatentsView_20210930.assignee_year d join (select assignee_id from PatentsView_20210930.assignee order by assignee_id LIMIT {limit} offset {offset}) p on p.assignee_id=d.assignee_id
